DataElement.preferredName: Patient Central Nervous System Involvement Or Intrathecal Route of Administration Chemotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether a patient has CNS involvement or is receiving intrathecal chemotherapy that meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Central Nervous System Involvement Or Intrathecal Route of Administration Chemotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Administration of drugs directly into spinal subarachnoid space in the cerebrospinal fluid, at any level of the cerebrospinal axis, including injection into the cerebral ventricles, in order to bypass the blood-brain barrier and achieve local, rapid effects on the meninges or cerebrospinal axis._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Central Nervous System Involvement Or Intrathecal Route of Administration Chemotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Administration within the cerebrospinal fluid at any level of the cerebrospinal axis, including injection into the cerebral ventricles.:The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Administration of drugs directly into spinal subarachnoid space in the cerebrospinal fluid, at any level of the cerebrospinal axis, including injection into the cerebral ventricles, in order to bypass the blood-brain barrier and achieve local, rapid effects on the meninges or cerebrospinal axis.
The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have known CNS i
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known CNS involvement with leukemia or is receiving intrathecal chemotherapy that is either prophylactic or therapeutic?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active central nervous system (CNS) leukemia or require maintenance intrathecal chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known CNS involvement with leukemia or is receiving intrathecal chemotherapy for active CNS leukemia or is receiving intrathecal chemotherapy that is either prophylactic or therapeutic?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have CNS involvement of lymphoma?
